revisions.rev:
[[File:Galaxy Nexus smartphone.jpg|thumb|120px|[[Galaxy Nexus]], the latest "[[Google Nexus|Google phone]]"]] '''Google phone''' may refer to: *One of the phones of the [[Google Nexus]] family: ** [[Nexus One]], an HTC-manufactured smartphone, released January 2010 ** [[Nexus S]], Samsung-manufactured successor to the Nexus One, released December 2010 ** [[Galaxy Nexus]], Samsung-manufactured successor to the Nexus S, expected to be released in November 2011 * [[Google Talk]], a stand-alone instant messaging (texting) client with voice chat capability * [[Google Voice]], a computer-based voice and video chat service
{{Disambiguation}}
